Itriedsohard,Icouldn'tfeeltheflow
translation: 无可救药，我已看不到出路

lyric: With every battle, my body took a toll
translation: 无休止的决斗，浑身作痛

lyric: Now every knockout, shows me a sign
translation: 又来了，是淘汰倒计时，结束的信号

lyric: Of who I'm meant to be
(I won't let your doubt ever break me)
translation: （我永远不会让你的质疑打败我）

lyric: Infamous brawler, give me some time
translation: 为钱而来的决斗者，在台上多站一刻吧

lyric: But
I'llshowyouwhatI'mmadeof,you'llsee
translation: 我会证明我本事，你们都会看到

lyric: Push me to the edge, I'll fight back even more

lyric: Triumph to the rider who dreams of gold
translation: 绝境逢生的决斗者，才会如愿以偿

translation: 我为决斗而来，擂台之上将高呼我的名字

lyric: The road I take will make me a champion
